definition: involving different areas of knowledge or study
the quality of being honest and having strong moral principles
the state of being whole and not divided
jam made from oranges, lemons, etc., eaten on bread, especially at breakfast
a very small piece of a material that is a semiconductor, used to carry a complicated electronic circuit
the art of writing or solving codes
the process of changing information that is in code into ordinary language so that it can be understood by anyone
a unit of information stored in a computer, equal to 8 bits. A computer’s memory is measured in bytes.
a unit for measuring computer memory or data, equal to 10 3, or 1 000 bytes
a unit for measuring computer memory or data, equal to 2 10, or 1 024 bytes
to suffer or die because you do not have enough food to eat; to make somebody suffer or die in this way
not having something that you need
the coins used in a particular place or at a particular time; coins of a particular type
the system of money used in a particular country
a word or phrase that has been invented recently; the process of inventing a word or phrase
